title: Baby
lyrics: Sé que te gusto a ti todavía Standing here in an empty room Take me back to that long September I was young, didn't know 'bout love Gave my heart to another lover Find me, in another place and time If only, if only you were mine But I'm already someone else's baby ...Guess I had my last chance ....And now this is our last dance .....You fell through the cracks in my hands Hard to say it's over But I'm already someone else's Baby, ahh Baby, ahh Baby, ahh But I'm already someone else's All caught up in the way we were Don't say the words that I love to hear I was young, didn't know 'bout love Let's leave things the way they were Hey, sé que te gusto a ti todavía por mucho que digas Además puedo ver en tus ojos Que no sólo quieres quedar como ami gos Tienes mi corazón, eres mi obsesión ...Soy tuyo pa' siempre Guess I had my last chance ....And now this is our last dance ...You fell through the cracks in my hands Tell myself be stronger My heart's like a rubber band And it's such a shame You'll always be the one who got away We both know that deep down you feel the same Hard to say it's over But I'm already someone else's (C'mon) Baby, ahh Baby, ahh Baby, ahh I'm already someone else's Wish I met you at another place and time If only, if on ly you were mine This love story ends for you and I 'Cause I'm already someone else's Baby, ahh Baby, ahh Baby, ahh But I'm already someone else's Baby, ahh Baby, ahh Baby, ahh I'm already someone else's
